verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H5810>prevailed<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> them the <S%H4492>dens<s%> which are in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H4631>caves<s%>, and strong <S%H4679>holds<s%>.

And so it was, when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2232>sown<s%>, that the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>, even they came <S%H5927>up<s%> against them;

And they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against them, and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> the <S%H2981>increase<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, till thou <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, and <S%H7604>left<s%> no <S%H4241>sustenance<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, neither <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, nor <S%H7794>ox<s%>, nor <S%H2543>ass<s%>.

For they came <S%H5927>up<s%> with their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and their <S%H168>tents<s%>, and they <S%H935%H935>came<s%> <S%H1767>as<s%> <S%H697>grasshoppers<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>; for both they and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were without <S%H4557>number<s%>: and they <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H1809>impoverished<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>; and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
¶ And it came to pass, when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H182>because<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>,

That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H376%H5030>prophet<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>;

And I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all that <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> you, and drave them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> you their <S%H776>land<s%>;

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto you, I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; <S%H3372>fear<s%> not the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, in whose <S%H776>land<s%> ye <S%H3427>dwell<s%>: but ye have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

¶ And there <S%H935>came<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> under an <S%H424>oak<s%> which was in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%>, that pertained unto <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H33>Abi-ezrite<s%>: and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H2251>threshed<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%> by the <S%H1660>winepress<s%>, to <S%H5127>hide<s%> it <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is with thee, thou <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man of <S%H2428>valour<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H113>Lord<s%>, <S%H3426>if<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be with us, why then is all this <S%H4672>befallen<s%> us? and where be all his <S%H6381>miracles<s%> which our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> us of, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Did not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> bring us <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>? but now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> us, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> us into the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> upon him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> in this thy <S%H3581>might<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>: have not I <S%H7971>sent<s%> thee?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H4100>wherewith<s%> shall I <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? behold, my <S%H504%H505>family<s%> is <S%H1800>poor<s%> in <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and I am the <S%H6810>least<s%> in my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Surely I will be with thee, and thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, If now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, then <S%H6213>shew<s%> me a <S%H226>sign<s%> that thou <S%H1696>talkest<s%> with me.

<S%H4185>Depart<s%> not hence, I pray thee, until I <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, and bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H4503>present<s%>, and <S%H3240>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> thee. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H3427>tarry<s%> until thou come <S%H7725>again<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%>, and made <S%H6213>ready<s%> a <S%H5795%H1423>kid<s%>, and unleavened <S%H4682>cakes<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H7058>flour<s%>: the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> in a <S%H5536>basket<s%>, and he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4839>broth<s%> in a <S%H6517>pot<s%>, and brought it <S%H3318>out<s%> unto him under the <S%H424>oak<s%>, and <S%H5066>presented<s%> it.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the unleavened <S%H4682>cakes<s%>, and <S%H3240>lay<s%> them upon <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and pour <S%H8210>out<s%> the <S%H4839>broth<s%>. And he <S%H6213>did<s%> so.

¶ Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4938>staff<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the unleavened <S%H4682>cakes<s%>; and there rose <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the unleavened <S%H4682>cakes<s%>. Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> out of his <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

And when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7200>perceived<s%> that he was an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H162>Alas<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>! for <S%H3651>because<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be unto thee; <S%H3372>fear<s%> not: thou shalt not <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> there unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H3073>Jehovah-shalom<s%>: unto this <S%H3117>day<s%> it is yet in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H33>Abi-ezrites<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass the same <S%H3915>night<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3947>Take<s%> thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6499>young<s%> <S%H7794>bullock<s%>, even the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> years <S%H8141>old<s%>, and throw <S%H2040>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> that thy <S%H1>father<s%> hath, and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H842>grove<s%> that is by it:

And <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of this <S%H4581>rock<s%>, in the ordered <S%H4634>place<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H5927>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%> with the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H842>grove<s%> which thou shalt cut <S%H3772>down<s%>.

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> unto him: and so it was, because he <S%H3372>feared<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>household<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, that he could not <S%H6213>do<s%> it by <S%H3119>day<s%>, that he <S%H6213>did<s%> it by <S%H3915>night<s%>.

¶ And when the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, behold, the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> was cast <S%H5422>down<s%>, and the <S%H842>grove<s%> was cut <S%H3772>down<s%> that was by it, and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> was <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was <S%H1129>built<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>, Who hath <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>? And when they <S%H1875>inquired<s%> and <S%H1245>asked<s%>, they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

Then the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3101>Joash<s%>, Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, that he may <S%H4191>die<s%>: because he hath cast <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and because he hath cut <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H842>grove<s%> that was by it.

And <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all that <S%H5975>stood<s%> against him, Will ye <S%H7378>plead<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal<s%>? will ye <S%H3467>save<s%> him? he that will <S%H7378>plead<s%> for him, let him be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> whilst it is yet <S%H1242>morning<s%>: if he be a <S%H430>god<s%>, let him <S%H7378>plead<s%> for himself, because one hath cast <S%H5422>down<s%> his <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

Therefore on that <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> him <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H7378>plead<s%> against him, because he hath thrown <S%H5422>down<s%> his <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

¶ Then all the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and went <S%H5674>over<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

But the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> upon <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, and he <S%H8628>blew<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>; and <S%H44>Abi-ezer<s%> was <S%H2199>gathered<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> throughout all <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; who also was <S%H2199>gathered<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him: and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto <S%H836>Asher<s%>, and unto <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, and unto <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>; and they came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them.
¶ And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, If thou <S%H3426>wilt<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, as thou hast <S%H1696>said<s%>,

Behold, I will <S%H3322>put<s%> a <S%H1492>fleece<s%> of <S%H6785>wool<s%> in the <S%H1637>floor<s%>; and if the <S%H2919>dew<s%> be on the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> only, and it be <S%H2721>dry<s%> upon all the <S%H776>earth<s%> beside, then shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou wilt <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, as thou hast <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And it was so: for he rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, and <S%H2115>thrust<s%> the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> <S%H2115>together<s%>, and <S%H4680>wringed<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%> out of the <S%H1492>fleece<s%>, a <S%H5602>bowl<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, Let not thine <S%H639>anger<s%> be <S%H2734>hot<s%> against me, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> but this <S%H6471>once<s%>: let me <S%H5254>prove<s%>, I pray thee, but this <S%H6471>once<s%> with the <S%H1492>fleece<s%>; let it now be <S%H2721>dry<s%> only upon the <S%H1492>fleece<s%>, and upon all the <S%H776>ground<s%> let there be <S%H2919>dew<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so that <S%H3915>night<s%>: for it was <S%H2721>dry<s%> upon the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> only, and there was <S%H2919>dew<s%> on all the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
